divs: Sighting DetailsReport taken by dispatch while witness was on phone....Steve Cox, Mufon Dispatch Went and stayed at a ranch owned by Robert Cross. House didnt look like something that should be in that area, looked like somrthing that should be on the coast on a beach, house had outside catwalks.. While staying in the house it was very windy, while he was laying down he noticed he couldnt hear the wind blowing anymore so he desided to go out and call the coyotes.. when he walked down stair he noticed a ball of sparkling light get up from the couch, float by him, through a double glass slideing door and rise up to the sky.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Douglas
There were no other sightings in Douglas on or around November 30th 1995
